document_data.name: Aerich the Steward
document_data.mainbody: '''Aerich the Steward''' was an [[undead]] [[zombie]] [[dwarf]] in [[Myth Drannor]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.History: The unfortunate post-dwarf remained inside [[Tyrintar's Hall]], along with many other undead. It was encountered when [[Uhlsdrin Nirveth]] came looking for the [[Icon of the Dwarves]] in [[1374 DR]].
